articles.content: Offseason is projection season. Just yesterday, we projected every starting quarterbacks chances at winning the MVP award. Obviously, what the Associated Press voters will think is not necessarily wh… [+15717 chars]

articles.title: Golden State Warriors Not Interested in LaMelo Ball, Have New Plans for NBA Draft Pick - Essentially Sports
articles.description: Chances for Golden State Warriors to go with Tyrese Haliburton instead of originally believed LaMelo Ball increase as front office goes to watch the former.
articles.content:
Sometimes situations can change in the blink of an eye. Something similar happened with prospective #1 NBA draft LaMelo Ball, as the Golden State Warriors have apparently changed their mind.
